name: Salomon Sense Ride 3 Gore-Tex Invisible Fit Trail Running Shoes - Women's
categories: Sense Ride 3 Gore-Tex Invisible Fit Trail Run
description: Breeze through your longest trail runs in lightweight waterproof running shoes. Invisible Fit technology adds waterproof-breathable protection with next-to-no additional weight. Seamless design and internal fit sleeves let you run sockless if you want to (you do you). A rock plate and toecap protect forefoot and toes from rocks and roots, and a responsive foam midsole cushions your landing and lets you use that energy for the next step. A grippy rubber sole offers excellent traction on slippery rocks, loose gravel and muddy sections.Light seamless mesh upper delivers a soft and comfortable feel with a secure fit.GORE-TEX® Invisible Fit technology provides reliable waterproofing with outstanding breathability.Internal SensiFit offers a performance fit ideal for high-output activity.Quicklace closure provides a secure fit with a single pull and includes a lace pocket.OptiVibe midsole provides durable shock absorption and reduces vibration through the sole.Revised 3D chassis delivers improved stability on technical terrain.Profeel Film protects the base of your foot from sharp objects.Contagrip MA outsole is designed for varied terrain with reliable grip on wet or rocky trails.Molded Ortholite insole is comfortable and smooth-fitting.
